string.text:
An issue of an everyday survival guide. The contents detail essential survival skills, focusing on practical techniques for staying alive in unusual and harsh environments. It provides an overview of standard survival kits, including their components, recommended configurations, and possible applications. The later chapters offer instructions on crafting basic gear from readily available materials with step by step guides and demonstration pictures. The guide is available in multiple issues, each dedicated to a specific area of expertise. Printed and distributed by a Norwegian publishing house.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] educational item
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] crafting instructions

A mechanics manual covering the fundamentals of mechanical engineering and electronics crafting. The manual includes detailed explanations of basic mechanical and electrical equipment, with clear diagrams and step-by-step instructions for assembly and repair with a strong focus on DIY approaches. It covers essential tools and components, from simple hand tools to more complex circuits and machinery, making it equally accessible for beginners and experienced technicians. Also includes sections dedicated to troubleshooting common issues and advice on improvising with limited resources. Printed and published by a German technical institute.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] educational item
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] crafting instructions

A manual of industrial engineering with a focus on modern electronics and portable devices. It describes the operation of key components such as operational amplifiers, semiconductor diodes, bipolar junction transistors, and field effect transistors, with detailed circuit diagrams and theoretical explanations. The manual's second section is dedicated to troubleshooting electrical devices and gives strategies on diagnosis and repair. Designed to serve both as a technical reference and a practical guide, suitable for different levels of expertise. Printed and published by a leading European technical press, written by a group of German and Czech engineers.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] educational item
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] crafting instructions

A handbook on the synthesis of medications and related compounds, focusing on analgesics, anesthetics, antibiotics, and antiseptics. Includes highly detailed guides for the preparation of essential components and materials, covering both theoretical background and practical lab techniques. Additional covers the use of analogues, alternative compounds, and methods for producing viable results in resource-limited settings. Authored by a team of Eastern European chemists and pharmacologists, printed and published by a renowned scientific press in a series on field lab work in crisis areas.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] educational item
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] crafting instructions

A comprehensive guide on ammunition and reloading, tailored for field operators and survivalists. The manual provides in-depth instructions on crafting hand-loaded munitions, from basic reloading techniques to the assembly of specialized rounds. Covers a range of calibers and bullet types, with a focus on optimizing performance and reliability under harsh conditions. Describes powder selection, primer handling, and case preparation with notes on safe and effective reloading practices. Published by a small survivalist group, remarked as field-tested and veteran-approved.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] educational item
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] crafting instructions

A practical guide to cooking in the Zone. This guide offers essential descriptions and recipes for preparing meals using the limited and often unconventional ingredients found in the exclusion zone. It covers basic cooking techniques, from campfire roasting to utilizing camping cooking gear, liquid fuel cookers, as well as field kitchens found in faction camps. Additionally includes sections on hunting wildlife, the differences between common meats, and even some tips on foraging for spices and herbs. Special attention is given to preserving food and maximizing nutritional value. Written and composed by an unknown author, likely an experienced stalker with a strong culinary background.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] educational item
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] crafting instructions

An old, faded notebook slipped into a card sleeve to protect it from wear and tear. Unfortunately, it didn't withstand the passage of time and only a small part is legible.
